title: Arteta warns that clubs could pull out of cups amid fixture congestion: football news – live

title: D66 has shown the world populists can be beaten, says Jetten, as party is projected to win Dutch election – Europe live
summary: D66 leader hailed a 'historic result' following an analysis by a Netherlands news agency indicating that the party has secured the most votes. The report also suggests that Geert Wilders' far-right PVV is no longer in contention for victory. This marks a significant shift in the political landscape of the Netherlands.

title: ‘A sense of freedom’: 80 years on from the Pan-African Congress in Manchester
summary: The legacy of this significant moment in Black history resonates globally, emphasizing the importance of unity. It serves as a reminder of the struggles faced and the progress made. The event's impact spans across generations, inspiring ongoing movements and solidarity.

title: Worries about immigration are ‘manufactured panic’ says charity as poll shows issue not a local concern – UK politics live
summary: A YouGov poll found that only 26% of respondents view immigration as a local issue, while over half consider it a national concern. This discrepancy highlights differing perceptions of immigration's impact at local versus national levels. The findings suggest a nuanced understanding of the immigration debate among the public.
